thread.section_title: Hilton Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Pleasant room. Friendly staff
thread.title_full: Pleasant room. Friendly staff - Review of Hilton Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: kjb176
title: Pleasant room. Friendly staff
text:
The hotel property size is just right for my preferences. Elevator wait times in lobby or from room floor level minimal. Rather odd though transiting from street level to front desk on upper level with luggage. Room was clean, quiet, and comfortable. Internet speed was good. The breakfast rate of $28.00 euros is pricey. Close proximity to last subway line. House red wine at bar was oddly warm and bitter. Efficient check-out. Every staff member encountered was very friendly and helpful.
